org.resthub.identity.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.controller.GenericControllerImpl<User,Long,UserService>
      • org.resthub.identity.controller.UserController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericController<User,Long>

    @Named(value="userController")
public class UserController
extends GenericControllerImpl<User,Long,UserService>
    Front controller for User Management
    Only ADMINS can access to the globality of this API
    Specific permissions are given when useful

      • getUserByLogin

        @RolesAllowed(value={"IM_USER_ADMIN","IM_USER_READ"})
public User getUserByLogin(String login)
        Return the user identified by the specified login.
        Parameters:
        login -
        Returns:
        the user, in XML or JSON if the user can be found otherwise HTTP Error 404

      • currentUser

        @RolesAllowed(value="IS_AUTHENTICATED_FULLY")
public User currentUser()
        Return the currently authentified Used

        This is the first method to call once authenticated with Oauth2 Currently, the Oauth2 authentication method is the one remaining We can't be log without using OAuth2 The user_id will be override by the filter layer, so we can't get the User object corresponding to another user than the one logged

        Parameters:
        login - , given by the filter layer, once the token has been checked
        Returns:
        the Logged User Object, in XMl or JSON type if everything OK, otherwise (It shouldn't append) an HTTP error 404
